clinical_study.brief_title: Alfuzosin for Treating Acute Urinary Retention
clinical_study.official_title: A Double-blind, Randomized,Placebo Controlled Study of Alfuzosin 10mg od in the Return to Successful Voiding in Patients With a First Episode of Acute Urinary Retention Due to Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia

brief_summary.textblock: The primary objective of the study is to assess the efficacy of alfuzosin 10mg daily in the return to successful voiding after removal of the catheter following a first episode of acute urinary retention (AUR) in patients suffering from benign prostatic hyperplasia (BPH).

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of patients with successful voiding after catheter removal

primary_outcome.time_frame: From the beginning to the end of the study
